record.field: 1. When developing a backlink strategy, what approach would be most beneficial?
A. Guest post the article to as many sites as possible
B. Create an infographic and share it with relevant bloggers
C. Create diverse and unnatural links
D. Distribute links in comment sections of websites
2. What is a key reason the URL domain.com/apparel/jackets is preferable to the URL domain.com/p=141?
D. It is readable to a human
3. Which HTTP response status code would indicate a page has been moved permanently?
4. You notice a website is serving HTML to a Search Engine than to a human user. What is this an example of?
5. What would significantly improve Google's ability to a non-YouTube video in its Search Results?
A. Provide a 150 x 80 pixel thumbnail image
D. Embed video objects with JavaScript conditionals
6. Google primarily determines indexing and ranking by crawling which version of a page?
7. You want to identify which US state has the most search interest for a particular keyword. What tool would help you determine this?
8. Which results are most likely if you use an interstitial pop-up that requires a user to take action before you load the content of the page?
A. Both the pop-up and the content of the page will be indexed
B. The pop-up will be indexed instead of the desired body content
C. An interstitial pop-up is treated the same as a soft 404
D. The pop-up will be ignored, and the content of the page will be indexed correctly
9. You notice a particular product in an e-commerce storefront is no longer indexed, despite no technical issues. What is a likely reason for this?
A. No title or meta description tags were provided
B. The Keywords is too competitive
C. Robots.txt is configured to allow access
D. The product is out of stock

10. All byline dates for articles are suddenly no longer visible on a website’s listing within Google Search. Assuming no changes have been made to the site programming or content, what is the most likely cause?
A. The site has been delisted from Google Search
B. A Google News sitemap was not provided within 30 days of setting up a publisher center account
C. The site kept updating the dates to make the content appear fresh, without changing
D. The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site
11. Q12. Which approach is not advisable to Geo-targeting your website?
A. Using a gTLD with a subdomain
D. Using a gTLD with a subdirectory

12. You have been asked to help a big e-commerce brand optimize its website for search engines. They currently have thousands of products listed on their website. What is your most appropriate first step?
A. Recommend that they add more products
B. Work on compressing image files
C. 302 redirect all product pages to URL that contains target keywords
D. Register the business with a Google My Business account.
A. It Is The Main Body Of Text On A Particular Web Page
B. It Is The Text Within The Left Or Top Panel Of A Web Page
C. It Is The Visible Text That Is Hyper Linked To Another Page
D. It Is The Most Prominent Text On The Page That The Search Engines Use To Assign A Title To The Page
15. What is an example of a Google search result that can be found in position zero?
16. You are optimizing a website that sells supplies for banking donuts. Which approach is most appropriate to drive more organic traffic?
A. Buy donutbakingsupplies.com and 301 redirects to your website
B. Add the keyword “donut supplies” to every page.
C. Create a new blog with high-quality donut recipes
D. Join a link farm to rapidly build inbound links.
17. Why is it important to be mindful of outbound follow links?
A. There is a limit to how many links you can create.
C. Any follow links reduce your PageRank by 1.
D. Your site’s reputation is tied to the sites you link to.
18. Which statement is true about JSON-LD?
A. It has no relation to JSON.
B. It is the only structured data format available.
C. It is considered the most complicated approach to adding structured data.
D. It is Google’s preferred structured data format.
19. What is a key reason why duplicate content might cause an issue with the ranking?
A. It creates an inability to use canonical URLs, which dramatically reduces crawl effectiveness
B. It requires using a 302 redirect, which dilutes PageRank.
c. It triggers an immediate manual action penalty, which delists an entire domain until the duplicate content is removed
d. It makes it difficult for a search engine to determine the original and authoritative content source.
20. What attribute would you use to describe the content of an image?
21. You are researching keywords for a client and creating a list for an optimization plan. Which is not a recommended method of creating keyword lists?
B. queries about benefits, features, problems
d. focusing on only high-volume, high-popularity words
22. You want to get a rough idea of how many searches per month a particular search term gets. Which tool do you use?
23. Changing the title tag and/or meta description will have a measurable impact on your …
23. Changing the title tag and/or meta description will have a measurable impact on your …
A. They move from simple to more complex as searchers gather more information and then refine their choices
b. They stay simple, as searchers try to use as few words as possible.
C. The keywords do not change much at all.
D. They move from complex to simple, as searchers find answers to their questions
25. Which technique is an example of black hat SEO?
26. A local accountant wants to start attracting more business directly from Google organic search. What is the best piece of advice to give to her?
A. Use the phrase “local accountant” as a keyword to focus her website on.
C. Register her business with a Google My Business account.
D. Leave a link to her website in the blog comments of popular accounting websites.
27. What is the anchor text in this code sample?
28. … analysis allows you to review requests made to your webserver to identify insights such as how ofter a crawler arrives, what pages have 404 errors, and most crawled pages
29. Which page title references content that is evergreen
A. Mega List of Teams Going to the Olympics
B. Complete Coverage of Microsoft’s Latest Announcement
C. The Future of SEO in 2020
30. You load a page and start reading an article, and suddenly the content on the page moves. What metric is used to quantify this impact on user experience?
